values: 允许；准许；使有可能；任凭；<正式>接受；认可；促使；（特地）酌留；承认；同意；让对方得分；允许进入（或出去、通过）

sample.mean: pl-n. 编年史；历史记录；年报
adv. 向后地；往回地；倒回原处地；反向地；回溯；每况愈下地
pl-n. 衣服；服装；被褥
n. 军；队；部队；一组；一队；芭蕾舞队；（芭蕾舞团）伴舞队（CORPS DE BALLET的简称）
pl-n. 遗传学；遗传性；遗传现象；遗传特征
adv. 或许；大概；可能；也许；好像
pron. 他们的；属于他们的；它们的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 表示"时间, 地点, 状态, 方式"
名词复数后缀, 表示数量多于一个

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 许可的；正当的；可承认的；可获宽免

word_mean_info__list.difference: 语气最强，指权威性的允许与认可。
普通用词，侧重听任、默许或不加阻止。在正式场合可用来表客气的请求。
常用词，用于各种非正式场合，语气最弱，指允许或无力阻止某事，暗示漠不关心或听之任之。
正式用词，在多数场合可与allow换用，语义最强，指准许某人做某事，含权威或正式的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 请允许我；让我来；让我试试

bilingual.source: I allow my child to go to the camp.
bilingual.target: 我允许我的孩子去营地。

bilingual.source: However, his parents won't allow him to train so much.
bilingual.target: 然而，他的父母不允许他训练这么多。

bilingual.source: The library in Charleston didn't allow colored folk inside.
bilingual.target: 查尔斯顿的图书馆不允许有色人种进入。

bilingual.source: Allow them a few minutes to talk about it in L1.
bilingual.target: 允许他们用母语讨论几分钟。

bilingual.source: My parents don't allow me to hang out with my friends.
bilingual.target: 我父母不允许我和朋友出去玩。

bilingual.source: I don't think they allow people to swim in the lake.
bilingual.target: 我认为他们不允许人在湖里游泳。

bilingual.source: Some schools don't allow cell phones because they think the phones can distract students from their work.
bilingual.target: 一些学校不允许使用手机，因为他们认为手机会分散学生的注意力。

bilingual.source: "We allow students the special things they need to help them learn just as easily as everyone else," she replied.
bilingual.target: “我们允许学生使用他们需要的特殊物品，以帮助他们像其他人一样轻松学习，”她回答道。

list.abstract: allow，英文单词，动词，有允许、同意、给某人留出等意思。

yingyinNormal.en: I hope you'll allow me to come. I want you to come.
yingyinNormal.zh: 希望你能允许我参加，我希望你参加。

yingyinNormal.en: You slaughter entire cities, yet you allow Ariq to run to Siberia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的命令无异于屠城，却允许阿里不哥逃去西伯利亚。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I can't force you to see reason. But I will not allow you to become dangerous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没法逼你想通道理，但我不允许你成为隐患。

yingyinNormal.en: Dr. Delaney? The judge won't allow any mention of him. Do we think he did it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 德兰尼教授？法官不允许提到他。我们认为是他干的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: He is a particularly troubled Romulan. Please. Allow me. It will be easier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是个麻烦的罗姆兰人，请允许我这么做，这样说起来比较快。

yingyinNormal.en: I do not think that you would allow your son to pledge himself to a lowly Silvan Elf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想您不会允许自己的儿子对出身卑微的木精灵有好感吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Never. That man's music was a curse. I will not allow it. If you would just... Miguel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 绝不，那个人的音乐是诅咒，我绝对不允许。如果你能... 米格尔。

yingyinNormal.en: Why wouldn't you wanna have every asset available to you? Allow me to do this, Mr. President.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么不愿意用上所有的资源呢？请允许我做这件事，总统先生。

yingyinNormal.en: If Caroline and Melissa Miller are released, we will allow supervised contact with the kidnappers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果卡洛琳和梅莉莎·米勒获释，我们将允许劫持者在监督下与其联络。

yingyinNormal.en: What's next? The Black Sea? The Arctic? I cannot allow the Chinese ships to come this close to my sovereign.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来呢？黑海吗？北极吗？我不能允许中国船只这么靠近我的领土。

yingyinNormal.en: In the meantime, we can't allow a disagreement over a single issue to be a deal breaker on every issue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 与此同时，我们不能允许，在单一问题的不同意见成为在所有问题上不能妥协的绊脚石。

yingyinNormal.en: Why secret? Because public opinion wouldn't allow spending on space exploration. Not while you're struggling to put food on the table.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么要保密？因为公众不允许花钱在宇宙探索上，尤其是当人们还填不饱肚子的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Roja, who is intimately connected with Lemond Bishop, a top drug dealer. Just allow me to question Mr. Bishop. That's all I ask.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗哈先生与大毒枭雷蒙德毕夏普私下有联系，请允许我询问毕夏普先生，我只有这一个请求。

yingyinNormal.en: Counselor, this is way past phony DUI's at this point, I will deny the writ of habeas-corpus, and allow the state's attorney their 48 hours upon arrest to charge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 律师，现在的情况严重性远超酒驾，因此我拒绝人身保护请求，允许州检察院在48小时内以这项指控进行逮捕。

yingyinNormal.en: Maya. You. You did this. Put me in jail for the rest of my life and don't allow visitors or else she'll come and bring me a stupid lemon meringue pie!
yingyinNormal.zh: 玛雅。是你。是你干的。让我在监狱里度过余生吧，不要允许探视，否则她就会过来，给我带一个傻不拉叽的柠檬酥皮派。

yingyinNormal.en: Allow me to please introduce to you, two of NASA's founding mission directors. and astronaut, Dr. Buzz Aldrin. One of the first two men to step foot on the moon. Sir. Optimus Prime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请允许我向你介绍建立航空航天局的两位主管以及宇航员，波兹阿尔德林博士，最先登陆月球的两人之一。长官。擎天柱。

yingyinNormal.en: I spent the rest of the night wondering what I was doing there, wondering what everyone else was doing there, wondering if any of my friends in San Francisco would invite me to a party at a club that didn't allow Blacks or Jews or Asians or gays
yingyinNormal.zh: 剩下的整个晚上我一直都在纳闷 自己来这里做什么。纳闷其他人都在做什么。纳闷旧金山会不会有朋友邀请我去一个不允许黑人 犹太人 亚洲人或同性恋者的俱乐部派对。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Allow us to demonstrate. Hi. Hi.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们来给大家演示一下。你好。你好。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you have it in you to allow that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你容许自己这么做吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not asking you to allow it, Gandalf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是在请求你的同意，甘道夫。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

exam_freq_info.chinese: 承认; 同意; 接受

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 容许量；定量；补助；津贴；零花钱；减载量；容许；忍受

word_family.mean: v. 承认；允许；让；给予；酌留；认为；考虑到；顾及；同意…做；准许…拥有

sense_info_list.en: to give permission for someone to do something, or to not prevent something from happening

examination_example.sentence: This gives the person a choice, <highlight>allowing</highlight> him to verbally opt in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这给了这个人一个选择，允许他口头选择加入。

examination_example.sentence: Weighing every other week <highlight>allows</highlight> me to observe and account for any significant weight changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每隔一周称重一次使我能够观察并解释任何明显的体重变化。

examination_example.sentence: The Web-based program <highlight>allows</highlight> you to systematically improve your memory and attention skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个基于网络的项目可以让你系统地提高记忆力和注意力技能。

sense_info_list.en: take something into consideration when making plans or calculations

examination_example.sentence: No matter how you enhance enclosures, they do not <highlight>allow</highlight> for freedom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论你如何加强围栏，它们都不允许自由。

sense_info_list.en: to admit or agree that something is true
sense_info_list.zh: 承认; 同意; 接受

名词复数后缀, 表示数量多于一个

word_usage.usage: “允许做某事”用allow doing sth.表达，“允许某人做某事”用allow sb. to do sth.，注意不用allow sb. doing sth.。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (allow for)考虑到; 将...计算在内

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 容许量；定量；补助；津贴；零花钱；减载量；容许；忍受

word_family.mean: v. 承认；允许；让；给予；酌留；认为；考虑到；顾及；同意…做；准许…拥有

sense_info_list.en: give or assign a resource to a particular person or cause

examination_example.sentence: If we <highlight>allow</highlight> this kind of labeling to continue, we will all lose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们允许这种标签继续下去，我们都将失败。

examination_example.sentence: Books can also <highlight>allow</highlight> children to see diversity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 书籍也可以让孩子们看到多样性。

examination_example.sentence: Should the public be <highlight>allowed</highlight> to use or reproduce images of famous people, given how iconic they are?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鉴于名人的偶像性，公众是否应该被允许使用或复制他们的图像？

sense_info_list.en: make it possible to have or do something

examination_example.sentence: In the second phase, as they grow wealthier, they pave the roads, <highlight>allowing</highlight> traffic to move faster and pushing up the death rate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到第二个阶段，随着他们变得富裕，他们铺路使交通速度更快，从而推高了死亡率。

examination_example.sentence: Practice does change the brain, he <highlight>allows</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他承认，练习确实能改变大脑。

sense_info_list.zh: (allow for)考虑到; 将...计算在内

sample.mean: pl-n. 编年史；历史记录；年报
adv. 向后地；往回地；倒回原处地；反向地；回溯；每况愈下地
pl-n. 衣服；服装；被褥
n. 军；队；部队；一组；一队；芭蕾舞队；（芭蕾舞团）伴舞队（CORPS DE BALLET的简称）
pl-n. 遗传学；遗传性；遗传现象；遗传特征
adv. 或许；大概；可能；也许；好像
pron. 他们的；属于他们的；它们的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 表示"时间, 地点, 状态, 方式"
名词复数后缀, 表示数量多于一个

word_usage.usage:
允许做某事 allow doing sth.
允许某人做某事 allow sb. to do sth.
某人被允许做某事 sb. be allowed to do sth.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指消极地不加反对, 有时含有听任或默许之意, 语气较轻。
指认为某人或某事是好的、对的、合适的, 常后接介词 of。
(由于慷慨、仁慈)给予某物, (通常是上对下、官方正式地)允许。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 容许量；定量；补助；津贴；零花钱；减载量；容许；忍受

word_family.mean: v. 承认；允许；让；给予；酌留；认为；考虑到；顾及；同意…做；准许…拥有

examination_example.sentence: Buses will be the only vehicles <highlight>allowed</highlight> on its streets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公共汽车将是唯一被允许在其街道上行驶的交通工具。

examination_example.sentence: Cars will not be <highlight>allowed</highlight> to enter the city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汽车将不被允许进入这个城市。

examination_example.sentence: You are not <highlight>allowed</highlight> to drive a car unsupervised until you have passed a driving test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你通过驾驶考试之前，不允许在无人监督的情况下驾驶汽车。

sense_info_list.en: make it possible to have or do something

examination_example.sentence: That <highlight>allows</highlight> researchers to measure only the effects of being chosen or not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使得研究人员可以只衡量被选中与否的影响。

examination_example.sentence: The toughness of the race <highlight>allows</highlight> for racers to eat pretty much whatever they want.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比赛的激烈程度使得参赛者几乎可以想吃什么就吃什么。

examination_example.sentence: Spending time alone also <highlight>allows</highlight> you to more efficiently take care of problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 独处也能让你更有效地处理问题。

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are <highlight>allowed</highlight> 30 minutes to write an essay titled "Is technology making people lazy?".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一部分，你有30分钟的时间写一篇题为“科技是否让人变懒？”的文章。

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are <highlight>allowed</highlight> 30 minutes to write an essay on online dictionaries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一部分，你有30分钟的时间写一篇关于在线词典的文章。

examination_example.sentence: For this part, you are <highlight>allowed</highlight> 30 minutes to write an essay on online libraries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一部分，你有30分钟的时间写一篇关于在线图书馆的文章。

adv. 向后地；往回地；倒回原处地；反向地；回溯；每况愈下地

word_usage.usage:
允许做某事 allow doing sth.
允许某人做某事 allow sb. to do sth.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指消极地不加反对，有时含有听任或默许之意，语气较轻。
指认为某人或某事是好的、对的、合适的，常后接介词 of。
(由于慷慨、仁慈)给予某物，(通常是上对下、官方正式地)允许。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 容许量；定量；补助；津贴；零花钱；减载量；容许；忍受

word_family.mean: v. 承认；允许；让；给予；酌留；认为；考虑到；顾及；同意…做；准许…拥有

examination_example.sentence: To learn to use social media, because it <highlight>allows</highlight> them to get to know the outside world better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学会使用社交媒体，因为它能让他们更好地了解外面的世界。

examination_example.sentence: He convinced the police department to <highlight>allow</highlight> him to set up a couple of "chat benches" in two of their local parks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说服警察局允许他在当地的两个公园里设立几个“聊天长凳”。

examination_example.sentence: A lunchtime escape <highlight>allows</highlight> her to keep a boss from tapping her on the shoulder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 午间休息可以让她避免老板拍她的肩膀。

examination_example.sentence: If you exercise out of doors, your body will breathe more deeply, <highlight>allowing</highlight> more oxygen to get to your muscles and your brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在户外锻炼，你的身体会更深地呼吸，让更多的氧气进入你的肌肉和大脑。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, it's a healthy way to work through the experience to <highlight>allow</highlight> room for positive growth and forgiveness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，这是一种度过这段经历的健康方式，给积极的成长和宽恕留下空间。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 副词后缀, 表示"时间, 地点, 状态, 方式"
名词复数后缀, 表示数量多于一个

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 容许量；定量；补助；津贴；零花钱；减载量；容许；忍受

word_family.mean: v. 承认；允许；让；给予；酌留；认为；考虑到；顾及；同意…做；准许…拥有

sense_info_list.en: give or assign a resource to a particular person or cause

examination_example.sentence: With the Internet, learners are <highlight>allowed</highlight> to learn at home or anywhere else.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有了互联网，学习者可以在家或其他任何地方学习。

examination_example.sentence: This activity will <highlight>allow</highlight> team members to learn about each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项活动将让团队成员相互了解。

examination_example.sentence: They were not <highlight>allowed</highlight> to get an education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不允许他们接受教育。

sense_info_list.en: make it possible to have or do something

examination_example.sentence: There are a number of different recycling steps that <highlight>allow</highlight> materials to be used more than once.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有许多不同的回收步骤，让材料可以被多次使用。

examination_example.sentence: He believed sports often <highlight>allowed</highlight> many kids to play together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他认为体育运动经常能让很多孩子一起玩。

examination_example.sentence: This technology would <highlight>allow</highlight> total freedom of movement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项技术将允许完全的行动自由。

sense_info_list.en: consider when making a decision or a calculation

examination_example.sentence: Remember that buses and trains can often be late so <highlight>allow</highlight> plenty of time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记住，公共汽车和火车经常会晚点，所以要留出充足的时间。

examination_example.sentence: These <highlight>allow</highlight> for different kinds of interactions about our health needs without involving the medical team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这考虑到了不同类型的互动，这些互动关乎我们的健康需求而不涉及医疗团队。

word_usage.usage:
允许做某事 allow doing sth.
允许某人做某事 allow sb. to do sth.
某人被允许做某事 sb. be allowed to do sth.
